passage_text: To show Bolivian Bolivianos and just one other currency click on any other currency. The Bolivian Boliviano is the currency in Bolivia (BO, BOL). The symbol for BOB can be written Bs. The Bolivian Boliviano is divided into 100 centavos. The exchange rate for the Bolivian Boliviano was last updated on October 14, 2015 from Bloomberg. The BOB conversion factor has 4 significant digits.
